short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your new Tab window with a Palestinian background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Palestine Tab is an extenstion that gives you a different experince each time you open a new tab on google chrome. 

Moreover, an Ayah from Quran will be displayed each time you open a new tab.

Features ğŸ‰:
1. You can see now choose to see sequance verses(Ayat) or random verses
2. See Prayer Times according to your location.
3. You can listen to the verse(ayah) with voice many reciters ğŸ”Š
4. You can see some Arabic Tafsirs of the verse Ayah ğŸ“š   
5. You can move Ayah forward or backward
6. Show Top sites that you visit the most ğŸ”
7. Move Ayat by Keyboard
